title: Union Bank Of India Launches Cross Border Trade Finance Service Trade Nxt | Mint - Mint
content: Union Bank Of India Launches Cross Border Trade Finance Service Trade Nxt | Mint  Mint
description: The platform will enable enterprises to conduct all export/import transactions, including entry and processing of letters of credit, bank guarantees, export/import bills, disbursement of export credit, outward and inward remittances and dealer financing, among other things
